headline: What Realty Income (O)'s 133rd Dividend Increase Signals About Its Income-Focused Strategy
summary: Realty Income recently announced a small increase in its monthly cash dividend to US$0.2700 per share from US$0.2695, payable on January 15, 2026 to shareholders of record on December 31, 2025, lifting the annualized payout to US$3.240 per share. This marks the company’s 133rd dividend increase since its 1994 NYSE listing, reinforcing its reputation for persistent, incremental income growth supported by a large, diversified global property portfolio. We’ll now explore how this latest...
